txt.en: Traps can be set outside Hultvís in Woodsedge.\n\nWary of trusting any with his tale, Atta has asked you to set traps in the woods outside Hultvís.
Set traps in the woods outside Hultvís ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Atta can be found in Hultvís.\n\nYou have set many traps in the woods outside Hultvís, and you should now return to Atta.

'Well, Skin-changer? If you insist on standing about at my house, perhaps you could help me with something.

'I've built these traps to protect my people, but I cannot set them myself without leaving Hultvís... and I-I can't do that.

'Set these traps in the woods outside Hultvís and spread them about!'
After his tale was met with disbelief by the people of Hultvís, Atta became mistrustful and withdrawn.
Long met with derision by some of the people of Hultvís, Atta insists that he speaks true of the old legends and fears the return of a terrible creature that once haunted the vales.

'If you insist on standing about at my house, perhaps you could help me with something.

'I've built these traps to protect my people, but I cannot set them myself without leaving Hultvís... and I-I can't do that.

'Set these traps in the woods outside Hultvís and spread them about!'
